min pera pawathi kisiyam chanda wimasimakadi apekshakayaku lesa idiripathwu ho danata kriyakari deshapalanaye nirathawa sitina kisiyam rajya niladhariyaku ho niladhariniyaka basnahira ha dakunu palath sabha mathiwarana rajakari sandaha yoda noganimata mathiwarana komasaris mahinda deshapriya mahatha thiranaya kota atha.‘palath sabha mathiwarana karya mandala awashyatha’ mayen amathyansha lekamwarun, rajya sewa komishan sabhawe lekam saha siyaluma departhamenthu pradhanin amathamin mathiwarana komasariswaraya yawa athi lipiye ese sandahan weyi.idiri masa thuna athulatha wishrama yana niladharin da, aniyam, thawakalika ha aadeshaka padanamin sewaya karana niladharin da mathiwarana rajakari sandaha yoda noganna lesa da mathiwarana komasariswaraya danum di atha.thawa da garbhani niladhariniyan saha mawu kiri dena kuda daruwan sitina niladhariniyan da mathiwarana rajakari sandaha yoda noganna lesa mathiwarana komasariswaraya thawa duratath danum di thibe..
